job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Redesign and optimize Kafka streaming components to enhance performance metrics.
     * Develop and upgrade application components to support near real-time data processing.
     * Ensure daily monitoring, maintenance, and debugging of all components to maintain stability and consistency.
job_details.full_text:
Software/Data Engineer

* Redesign and optimize Kafka streaming components to enhance performance metrics.
     * Develop and upgrade application components to support near real-time data processing.
     * Ensure daily monitoring, maintenance, and debugging of all components to maintain stability and consistency.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on data engineering tasks like optimizing Kafka streaming components and real-time data processing, along with monitoring and debugging. It lacks specific mentions of machine learning model development, generative AI techniques, or the core responsibilities associated with ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles. Therefore, it falls under the 'Ambiguous' category as it does not align with the technical requirements of the specialized AI engineering roles.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Redesign and optimize Kafka streaming components to enhance performance metrics' directly relates to building and maintaining data pipelines and infrastructure, which is the core of data engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Redesign and optimize Kafka streaming components to enhance performance metrics

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop and upgrade application components to support near real-time data processing' involves creating and improving systems for handling data streams, a key aspect of data engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and upgrade application components to support near real-time data processing

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Ensure daily monitoring, maintenance, and debugging of all components to maintain stability and consistency' describes the operational aspects of keeping systems running, which aligns with operations engineering, though not specifically MLOps in the AI context.
job_tasks.phrase: Ensure daily monitoring, maintenance, and debugging of all components to maintain stability and consistency
